CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High-explosive anti-tank
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Grenade with a shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a stream of metal that punches through enemy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Thermobaric
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Disperses and subsequently ignites a fuel-air explosive mix, creating a powerful explosion and potentially igniting flammable objects.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Cryo
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled mixture of solid hydrogen and unstable compounds that vaporizes on contact with the air.
